page.title: 16CHURCHES INNERLEITHEN
page.content: {Innerleithen Parish Church. Rev. John Wilson is the present minister. In 1985 each week 180_200 people attend church.Helping the minister to handle the affairs of the church are 27 elders in the Kirk Session.In the winter months there are a Woman's Guild and a Young Woman's Group which meet weekly.About 40 children attend Sunday School where they sing, hear a Bible story and fill in activity sheets.In June the annual outing is great fun.Young teenagers meet in the hall.} With members of{St. James R.C. Church} and{St. Andrew's Scottish Episcopalian {Church}all work together for events like fetes, coffee mornings or for Ethiopia. Until recently Father Creanor's folk group of 50 enthusiasts played at concerts in many Border towns.
